DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the accuracy of preoperative clinical examination in penetrating injuries
DOC.brief_title: Diagnostic Accuracy of the Preoperative Clinical Examination in Upper Limb Injuries
DOC.detailed_description: Penetrating injuries is a common cause of severe neurovascular damage, both in adults and children.we evaluated the accuracy of the preoperative clinical examination in depicting lesions caused by penetrating wounds of hands or forearms.
DOC.criteria: Deep penetrating injury to upper limb
DOC.keyword: Clinical Examination, Accuracy, Hand, Tendon, Injury.
